rules_text:
{W}{B}, Shuffle Inexorable Explorer into your library: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
{W}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Inexorable Explorer from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: [i]“I can't slow down, I can't hold back, until I close my eyes for good.”[/i]
notes: No Rest for the Wicked — Cage the Elephant
